prod_desc: Pack a punch with the Republic Fighter Tank!
prod_long_desc:
Engage the Droid Army with this LEGO® Star Wars Republic Fighter Tank, featuring an opening top hatch with minifigure cockpit, 2 elevating guns with stud shooters, rear ammo store and hidden wheels for a hover look. This set also includes 2 minifigures and 2 droid figures.
Build the Republic Fighter Tank and hover into battle against the Droid Army
Featured in the Star Wars: The Clone Wars TV show
Includes Aayla Secura, a Clone Trooper Gunner and two Battle Droids
LEGO Star Wars building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building
The Tank is over 2” high, 6” long and 4” wide
305 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 8 and 14 years old
